description:
Sexy 19yr old Tara Lyn Fox is now the subject of this month's live feed Mondays. So why are we showing her again? The answer is simple, context. This isn't just any update, this was the first one for Tara, her first scene ever with Device Bondage.
The first time this adorable, nubile goddess sat in the interview chair, no one expected her to be able to handle the site. She was only 19. Beautiful, tan, sexy and fun. No way this little spoiled girl is going to be able to handle Device Bondage.
Tara Lynn Fox not only handled the day, but did so well she won a live show spot. Only 24 girls get this honor a year and we do not give them out lightly. So enjoy Tara's first scene ever, and then see how far she has come.
title: Tara Lynn Fox
